text: Protein crystallography is currently the most successful method for determining the threedimensional ( 3D ) conformation of a protein , yet it remains labor intensive and relies on an expert 's ability to derive and evaluate a protein scene model .In this paper , the problem of protein structure determination is formulated as an exercise in scene analysis .
